ygData.subject: Re: Dueling Tip
ygData.msgSnippet: The other big damage spells(Force Shock etc...) that disrupt are resisted too often in PvP to be reliable.  The only one that I have used with success is
ygData.messageBody:
The other big damage spells(Force Shock etc...) that disrupt are resisted
too often in PvP to be reliable. The only one that I have used with success
is Tishan's Clash which also is resisted so I use it with caution.

As for Rallos Zek, yes I do see many people quitting and I think that their
reasons for the most part are valid. The two most powerful classes for PvP
and dueling in my opinion are the Wizard and Druid(People say Necros too but
I haven't seen enough of them in PvP situations to make a judgement on
them). There IS skill involved in dueling but the classes weren't designed
for balance in PvP. If a caster knows what they are doing, A melee type
doesn't stand a chance. I have seen a few duels where a well played melee
class destroys the caster. A monk with JBoots is a hard fight for a caster
in an enclosed area... I have also seen a level 31 Bard annihilate a 35
Wizard. And that fight was won with skill and knowledge.

At least these quittin guys are gettin some cash sellin their characters on
Ebay =)

Euros Arcane
Rallos Zek


-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Bratina [mailto:gbratina@...]
Sent: Friday, July 02, 1999 5:29 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Dueling Tip


From: "Tom Bratina" <gbratina@...>

ahhh. i like that. and u can cast about 15-20 of those suckers too for a
nice 83dmg. any other spells that disrupt? from what i can tell, force
shock and frost shock knock u back a step or two when cast???? i think we
need another stun spell somewhere between tishan and markar (lvl 20 and lvl
49).

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek

ps. euros, ur on rz right? im noticing a LOT of ppl quitting because of the
terrible combat engine and imbalance in PvP combat. seems like if
everything isn't perfectly setup (ie. a duel) then the outcome is 99%
predictable (save for guild wars which are non-existent on the server now).

-----Original Message-----
From: James Guintu <james@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 02, 1999 6:30 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Dueling Tip


>From: "James Guintu" <james@...>
>
>I was messing around with some friends (whom are all casting classes and me
>as a wiz) tonight and discovered(from a tip) something very interesting...
>At higher levels everyone's DD spells take a while to cast... Our secret
>weapon is our level 12 DD spell shock of lightning. It is hardly ever
>resisted, casts extremely fast AND interrupts casting. You can chain cast
>this sucker so much faster than other casting classes it's sick. Unless my
>buddies went to their lower level spells, I would interrupt them every
time.
>Hoping you others out there will share your tips as well.
>
>Euros Arcane
>Rallos Zek
>
>
